metadata.dc:description: The AA have planned a series of indications regarding the endoscopy of the nasoopharynx. Among 631 explorations done in a three-year term, normal findings were seen in 260 subjects. In the other cases several aspects of the inflammatory or neoplastic pathology could be verified. One individual showed an esthesioneuroblastoma in an early evolutive stage.
metadata.dc:title: La fibroendoscopia del cavum: sus indicaciones.
[Fiber endoscopy of the nasopharynx: its indications].
